Posts.Content: He is on Finasteride 5mg daily. It will only be 3 weeks since his last test. I suppose I am rushing things wanting it checked sooner then later. The doctor did the rectal exam and then wanted blood test done again, before deciding if he needed the biopsy. The rectal exam didn't really show anything, but he said that doesn't rule out that there could be a problem.
Posts.Title: My husband does not want to be tested for Prostate Cancer.

Posts.Content: His PSA jumped from 1.9 a year ago to 4.5, but because of medicine he is already on for his Prostrate the doctor said it was like a 9.0 rate. He is 63. He is having his PSA checked again next week and then we meet with the doctor August 1st. If his PSA is still high we need to decide by then if we want a biopsy to determine if it is cancer.
Posts.Title: My husband does not want to be tested for Prostate Cancer.

Posts.Content: My husband possible has prostate cancer, but he doesn't want to have the biopsy to find out. He has failing health (5 strokes) and does not wish to know. I know it is his decision, but I really need to know what is going on. I am a worrier. Anyone have any imput for me?
